divs: Sighting DetailsMy buddy and I were shooting pics of sun,wondering why a black spot always appears in middle of sun on picture in digital camera.I took a few more pics and was downloading to computer to enlarge when we noticed an object to the lower right of the sun and the sunlight is glinting off it. It appears to be some sort of silver object that was only in one picture,like it was very fast.The photo is from my deck,looking westward at 5:00 p.m.,sept. 02,2010.
Summary: trying out camera,picked up unknown object in photo
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Brockville
There were no other sightings in Brockville on or around September 2nd 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
